name: Mar & Sol Adventure
description:
Mar and it's friend Sol have lost their spaceship and wi'll try to find a way to find it so they can go home!

Jam Site:  Globant - Mar del Plata

Jam Year: 2021

Platforms:  MS Windows

Tools And Technologies:  .Net, Unity (any product)

Credits

HOW TO PLAY!

Jump: Space

Fire: Left Mouse Button
